about_the_game:
Welcome to join the official communication group:834885556

You can play different roles into the squid park to play, your every choice or behavior will have a slight impact on the squid Park, and this is a fusion of Roguelite horizontal action game, so don't think back, death is not the end, just wake up from a dream.

Rich main line, branch line, butterfly effect

Different protagonists have different main lines, during the adventure, your ability level and state will make your main line and branch to different possibilities, and the different choices you make will also have an impact on the subsequent, causing the butterfly effect.

Rich skill tree

Whether the main character or the supporting character, all the actionable characters in the game have their own unique skill tree, which can be developed according to the way you like to play.

Rich equipment and magical items

There are a lot of special effects equipment and items in the game, some dropped randomly by monsters, some given to you by different story branches or NPCS, or who you stole them from? Anyway, they'll be useful.

Random map

Every map, every room is randomly generated, and you don't know what's going to happen next, and neither do I.

Random monsters and powerful BOSS battles

Every battle here has randomly generated monsters, there are some powerful BOSS battles, and of course there will be some characters who are not bosses due to your choice, so be careful.

【 Developer's words 】

First of all, thank you for downloading and supporting the "Squid Park" everyone (to the knees of orz), this game is currently only a demo, because from the project to the completion of the production only 6 months, there are many imperfect places, whether it is the plot, combat or art performance, can be described as rough, because of the lack of manpower, We even used AI assistance on scenes, monster drawings, and BGM, but please be assured that we will replace all AI content with official footage in the official release.

Originally, we planned to do the main line of three characters and two complete regional content, but obviously we were too ignorant, and now the content presented has been made by the partners working overtime (who would have thought that we this group of guys who are not in class, even more than at work)...

Finally, we hope that after the experience, a lot of comments, to provide us with guidance and advice, which is very important to us! (Please don't pity us ~~)

If you are interested in this project, you can also contact us to join us, we welcome all friends who have a passion for the game to participate! (Of course, free is even better!!) )
detailed_description:
Welcome to join the official communication group:834885556

You can play different roles into the squid park to play, your every choice or behavior will have a slight impact on the squid Park, and this is a fusion of Roguelite horizontal action game, so don't think back, death is not the end, just wake up from a dream.

Rich main line, branch line, butterfly effect

Different protagonists have different main lines, during the adventure, your ability level and state will make your main line and branch to different possibilities, and the different choices you make will also have an impact on the subsequent, causing the butterfly effect.

Rich skill tree

Whether the main character or the supporting character, all the actionable characters in the game have their own unique skill tree, which can be developed according to the way you like to play.

Rich equipment and magical items

There are a lot of special effects equipment and items in the game, some dropped randomly by monsters, some given to you by different story branches or NPCS, or who you stole them from? Anyway, they'll be useful.

Random map

Every map, every room is randomly generated, and you don't know what's going to happen next, and neither do I.

Random monsters and powerful BOSS battles

Every battle here has randomly generated monsters, there are some powerful BOSS battles, and of course there will be some characters who are not bosses due to your choice, so be careful.

【 Developer's words 】

First of all, thank you for downloading and supporting the "Squid Park" everyone (to the knees of orz), this game is currently only a demo, because from the project to the completion of the production only 6 months, there are many imperfect places, whether it is the plot, combat or art performance, can be described as rough, because of the lack of manpower, We even used AI assistance on scenes, monster drawings, and BGM, but please be assured that we will replace all AI content with official footage in the official release.

Originally, we planned to do the main line of three characters and two complete regional content, but obviously we were too ignorant, and now the content presented has been made by the partners working overtime (who would have thought that we this group of guys who are not in class, even more than at work)...

Finally, we hope that after the experience, a lot of comments, to provide us with guidance and advice, which is very important to us! (Please don't pity us ~~)

If you are interested in this project, you can also contact us to join us, we welcome all friends who have a passion for the game to participate! (Of course, free is even better!!) )
name: Amusement Park

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 64位系统
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3200及以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750及以上
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 64位系统
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4400及以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960及以上
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
